message: Resque is awesome and we have been using the web interface for monitoring. However, once in awhile, we get the 'Sinatra doesn't know this ditty.' page when accessing (/overview/). Typing in some weird path (/overview/t) seems to be able to by pass that page so we can go back to the '/overview' page again thru the page. (Sometimes /overview/ will redirect to /overview/true/false page as well...) Thx!
